Get Github R Packages

Source: R/get_github_packages.R
get_github_packages.Rd

Get Github R Packages

get_github_packages(group = "KWB-R",
  github_token = getOption("github_token"))

Arguments

group

default: "KWB-R"
github_token

optionally a Github token in order to access private repositories (default: NULL)

Value

data frame with R packages on Github

Examples

pkgs <- get_github_packages()
head(pkgs)
#>              name            full_name                                     url
#> 9  aquanes.report KWB-R/aquanes.report https://github.com/KWB-R/aquanes.report
#> 23       kwb.base       KWB-R/kwb.base       https://github.com/KWB-R/kwb.base
#> 29       kwb.code       KWB-R/kwb.code       https://github.com/KWB-R/kwb.code
#> 12   kwb.datetime   KWB-R/kwb.datetime   https://github.com/KWB-R/kwb.datetime
#> 22         kwb.db         KWB-R/kwb.db         https://github.com/KWB-R/kwb.db
#> 6     kwb.default    KWB-R/kwb.default    https://github.com/KWB-R/kwb.default
#>              created_at            pushed_at open_issues license_key
#> 9  2017-02-28T12:44:26Z 2018-08-29T12:32:38Z           0         mit
#> 23 2018-06-15T15:46:06Z 2018-07-07T14:13:40Z           0         mit
#> 29 2018-07-08T23:23:47Z 2018-09-27T14:46:17Z           2         mit
#> 12 2017-11-06T14:59:51Z 2018-07-10T17:02:40Z           1         mit
#> 22 2018-06-14T17:55:29Z 2018-10-23T13:59:56Z           0         mit
#> 6  2016-08-27T13:03:12Z 2018-07-10T17:17:46Z           0         mit
#>    license_short                                                license_link
#> 9            MIT https://github.com/KWB-R/aquanes.report/blob/master/LICENSE
#> 23           MIT       https://github.com/KWB-R/kwb.base/blob/master/LICENSE
#> 29           MIT       https://github.com/KWB-R/kwb.code/blob/master/LICENSE
#> 12           MIT   https://github.com/KWB-R/kwb.datetime/blob/master/LICENSE
#> 22           MIT         https://github.com/KWB-R/kwb.db/blob/master/LICENSE
#> 6            MIT    https://github.com/KWB-R/kwb.default/blob/master/LICENSE
#>                                                   Repository
#> 9  [aquanes.report](https://github.com/KWB-R/aquanes.report)
#> 23             [kwb.base](https://github.com/KWB-R/kwb.base)
#> 29             [kwb.code](https://github.com/KWB-R/kwb.code)
#> 12     [kwb.datetime](https://github.com/KWB-R/kwb.datetime)
#> 22                 [kwb.db](https://github.com/KWB-R/kwb.db)

#>                                                               License
